manipulators.description: Change right option to Hyper (i.e., command+control+option+shift)

rules.description: Swap left command and control in VM/Remote Desktop
Use standard function keys in virtual machine/remote desktop
Press Fn + function keys to use special features in virtual machine/remote desktop
Change spacebar to left_shift. (Post spacebar if pressed alone)
Change command to controll to switch between MAC Desktops
